2024.title: Android Studio Koala Feature Drop (2024.1.2)
2024.description: Adds Google Play SDK Console warnings, Jetpack Compose Glance widget previews, default Live Edit in Compose, enhanced Profiler, USB speed detection, IntelliJ 2024.1 features like sticky lines and terminal improvements.

2024.title: Android 15
2024.description: Released Sept 3 2024; emphasizes privacy, enhanced media & camera APIs, tablet/foldable UI improvements, ISO 21496 HDR support, redesigned credentials manager, and better desktop-mode multitasking.

2024.title: Android 16 Developer Preview
2024.description: Preview released Dec 12 2024; introduces new photo-picker with cloud integration, Health Connect FHIR medical APIs, Privacy Sandbox, audio sharing via Bluetooth LE Auracast, notification cooldown, adaptive app autosizing.

2024.title: Jetpack Compose reaches Material 3 adaptive UIs
2024.description: In Sept 2024, stable Compose 1.0 APIs enable adaptive UI with Material 3; adoption grew to ~40% of top 1K Play Store apps by May 2024.

2024.title: Gemini AI & Agentic AI in Android Studio
2024.description: Preview launched Jun 2025 I/O: Gemini-powered code suggestions, Agent Mode for multi-step tasks, UI image prompts, crash-report insights, and enterprise privacy via Gemini Code Assist.

2024.title: Android XR & smart glasses platform
2024.description: Announced Mid‑2024: Android XR for AR/VR devices, including AI‑powered smart glasses and mixed‑reality headsets with Gemini assistant, hand/eye tracking.

2024.title: Firebase Studio (formerly Project IDX)
2024.description: Rebranded in Apr 2025; cloud‑based AI‑enabled IDE for Android/iOS with built‑in emulators released in open beta May 2024.

2024.title: LLM‑based tools: LLM‑CompDroid & GUPPY
2024.description: Academic breakthroughs using large‑language models to auto‑repair config bugs (LLM‑CompDroid) and update deprecated Android API calls (GUPPY) in early‑2024 research.

2024.title: GrapheneOS security enhancements
2024.description: GrapheneOS (Apr 2025) adds revocable network/sensor permissions, secure browser, PIN scrambling, auto‑disable of hardware sensors and advanced privacy controls.

2024.title: Android development trends: AI, 5G, foldables, KMM
2024.description: Industry trends emphasize AI/ML integration, 5G-optimized experiences, foldable & multi-screen UIs, Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile, instant apps, AR/VR, IoT, chatbots, cloud & voice UIs.
